article.title: ChemImage to Provide Explosive Detection Kits
article.text: ChemImage Bio Threat LLC, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania was awarded a $13 million firm-fixed-price contract to procure the enhancement, testing, and delivery of vehicle-mounted Light Guard Mercury explosive detection systems. The Army Contracting Command, Picatinny Arsenal, New Jersey, is the contracting activity (W15QKN-14-C-0059).
